name: RiskAdjustmenthierarchicalStatusCodeSystem
title: Risk Adjustment Hierarchical Status Code System
description: (The Da Vinci Risk Adjustment Implementation Guide is under development). This is a code system for Risk Adjustment Hierarchical Status to indicate whether hiearchies were applied to a Condition Category, and if applied, whether the Condition Category is superseded.

concept.display: Hiearchies applied and Condition Category is superseded
concept.definition: Hiearchies were applied to a Condition Catetory and the Condition Category is superseded.

concept.display: Hiearchies applied and Condition Category is not superseded
concept.definition: Hiearchies were applied to a Condition Catetory and the Condition Category is not superseded.
Hiearchies were not applied to a Condition Catetory.
Applying hiearchies to a Condition Category is not applicable.
